title: 109_hr1037
content: There is no information provided in the prev_chunk to assist with summarizing the curr_chunk. Section 119 of title 17, United States Code, is amended to include changes related to commercial single satellite carriers and cable systems. Section 119 of title 17, United States Code, is amended to include changes related to commercial single satellite carriers and cable systems. The amendments include inserting "U.S. Television Household Estimates by" after "according to," authorizing under paragraph (3), defining significantly viewed, and specifying "otherwise" after "specifically stated." Subsection (a)(4)(E) is amended to clarify the applicability of the statutory license to secondary transmissions. Subsection (a)(4)(F) and subsection (a)(14) are also amended to specify changes in language. Subsection (c)(1) is amended to include the insertion of "notice" after "shall cause." The curr_chunk involves amendments to language regarding distributors, copyright, and royalty fees in the statutory license for secondary transmissions. The curr_chunk involves amending language related to royalty fees paid by satellite carriers and distributors for secondary transmission of network stations and superstations. The curr_chunk involves amending language related to royalty fees paid by satellite carriers and distributors for secondary transmission of network stations and superstations by adjusting specific clauses and terminology. Amendments are made to clauses and terminology related to royalty fees paid by satellite carriers and distributors for secondary transmission of network stations and superstations. Amendments are made to various subsections related to television stations, including changes to punctuation and terminology definitions.
